node.name: Attention
node.rich_text: Kisi cheez par dhyan dena taaki usse kuch important baat samajh sakein ya data le sakein.

Jaise: • Jab tu kisi YouTube video ko dhyan se dekhta hai kyunki vo tere kaam ki hai, to tu attention de raha hai. • Jab tu kisi boring cheez ko dekhta hai, par soch aur dhyan bhatak jaata hai matlab attention toot gayi.
Attention ko bahut cheezein control karti hain: • Tere
(past knowledge ya skills) Agar tujhe kisi topic mein naturally interest hai (jaise hacking/infosec), to attention automatically ban jaati hai.
Attention vs Concentration vs Focus Confuse mat ho:

row.cell: Iss moment mein kis cheez pe tera dhyan hai
Usi cheez pe dhyan banaye rakhna
Lambe samay tak us goal pe kaam karna jiska result tu chaahta hai
